data.name: diplomacyAdviceMilitaryNeedMoreForces
data.value: The $CIVADJ0 military forces outnumber us! That's not good...

data.name: diplomacyAdviceMilitaryEqualForces
data.value: The $CIVADJ0 military force is about the same size as ours.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceMilitarySuperiorForces
data.value: Our forces outnumber the $CIVNOUN0. That's good...

data.name: diplomacyAdviceScienceNeedMoreTech1
data.value: The $CIVADJ0 people are technologically advanced!

data.name: diplomacyAdviceScienceEqualTech1
data.value: The $CIVADJ0 scientific achievements match our own.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceScienceSuperiorTech1
data.value: The $CIVADJ0 scientists are not very advanced.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceScienceSuperiorTech2
data.value: The $CIVADJ0 people say we are technologically advanced!

data.name: diplomacyAdviceScienceEqualTech2
data.value: The $CIVADJ0 people feel they are our scientific equals.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceScienceNeedMoreTech2
data.value: The $CIVADJ0 people say we are technologically backwards.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceTheyFearUnit
data.value: The $CIVADJ0 army fears our $UNIT1.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceTheirCulturalPerception
data.value: The $CIVADJ1 people are $CULTURAL_OPINION0 our culture.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceOurCulturalPerception
data.value: Our people are $CULTURAL_OPINION0 the $CIVADJ1 cultural achievements.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceTheirBestUnit
data.value: The $CIVADJ0 military has the $UNIT1.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceTheyAttacked
data.value: Don't forget, the $CIVADJ0 armies have attacked us before. I don't know that we should trust them.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceNeverMet
data.value: We have not met this one before. Be careful...

data.name: diplomacyAdviceTheyLie
data.value: $LEADER0 is a known liar and cheat. Deal with $HIM_OR_HER1 carefully.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceTheyBetrayedOurFriends
data.value: We know that $LEADER0 has betrayed our friends the $CIVNOUN1.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceNoLandRoute
data.value: We cannot trade luxuries or resources without a trade route. A road connecting our capitals would do it.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceNoSeaRoute
data.value: We cannot trade trade luxuries or resources with the $CIVNOUN0 without a trade route. Building a harbor would do it.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceWeHaveEmbargo
data.value: We have agreed not to trade with the $CIVNOUN0 -- we have a trade embargo against them.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceTheyHaveEmbargo
data.value: We cannot trade resources or luxuries with the $CIVNOUN0 -- they have a trade embargo against us.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceOfferResource1
data.value: We have a trade route with the $CIVNoun0... maybe we should offer them some of our excess $RESOURCE_OR_LUXURY1.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceGetResource
data.value: The $CIVNoun0 have $RESOURCE_OR_LUXURY1 which they may be willing to trade to us.

data.name: diplomacyAdviceOfferResource2
data.value: We have $NUM0 excess $RESOURCE1, and the $CIVNoun0 would love to have it. Why don't we see what they'll offer...
